name: New Best Visibility Toggle
description: Hide new best GUI on pause menu

issues.info: If you find any bugs, or have any feature requests, please post them on this github!

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Soft toggle for the mod. Nothing will happen on pause if this is disabled.

showOnlyOnBest.name: Show only on best
showOnlyOnBest.description: Only show the hide button on pause menu when a new best is achieved.

showOnResume.name: Show on resume
showOnResume.description: Show The new best UI when resuming a level.

SaveAcrossLevels.name: Save Visibility Settings
SaveAcrossLevels.description: Saves Your New Best visibility setting across levels. I'm unsure if this should be a default.
